title: Disable Kayle, Taric and/or Yi in Nexus Blitz (anti-fun Kayle/Taric-Yi strategy).
body: Or they will ruin the gamemode - especially with no ban system. I hate to be that guy asking for shit to be disabled, but this shit just ruins the fun.

replies.body: lol, sitting at 3w:1L... all 3 wins I played Taric.... it must be op
Yup, literally sick of seeing yi in literally every game. And those invulerable ultimates are way too op in this mode.

Yeah I imagine that's no fun at all.

I think tarics just generally a problem when he gets free gold and can't be punished in a laning phase. I'd rather not turn anything off though. More likely we'll just nerf taric on blitz.
